p: Required colonies (1.5 × 10 8 cfu·mL −1) of freshly cultured bacteria were inoculated aseptically to glass vials containing normal saline. The suspension was homogenized by vortexing the solution and compared with the turbidity of 0.5 McFarland standard turbidity recommended by the WHO, 1991 [ 21], for the antimicrobial susceptibility test.
